file_content.text: Project Eclipse is over. Let's hope it does what was needed.
That was fantastic. I saw the broadcast.
Project Eclipse is a success. The whole galaxy has seen what the Empire can do.
Glad to hear it.
Indeed. The Republic will remember today.
I tried, but I couldn't save your men.
Sorry about your people.
They knew the mission. They... died in the line of duty. All of you did the Empire proud.
Words won't change anything. The fight is what matters.
It's all just propaganda.
I won't argue. What matters is that for now, we're winning.
What was that? We spent weeks preparing a speech for Project Eclipse, and you... you ramble?
I am Sith. I am the Empire. You are nothing.
You dare question me?
Yes, my lord. I'll note that in my report.
Question me again, and you'll spend the rest of your life in a cell.
You dare doubt me?
Reach for your blaster and say that again.
You dare question me?
I don't think that's necessary. Sir.
I won't apologize.
I see. I will be reporting this. Project Eclipse was not a whim.
We were ambushed. Your team was killed. I did all I could.
Sorry, the mission was a mess.
I see. I appreciate your efforts at salvage, but... what's done is done.
There's a lot riding on this broadcast. Get my team in.
Everyone--get ready to move. Project Eclipse is back on.
We lost half the squad on patrol. I can't guarantee anyone's safety.
Damnation. It's too late to back out.
Sir--someone's here. I think it's important.
Excuse me, friends, but I believe General Kolvin mentioned your names to me. I'm Minos, I represent the Outreach Bureau.
Excuse me, I believe we have a common friend in General Kolvin. I represent the Outreach Bureau.
Sir--company.
Excuse me, friends, but our associates in the Diplomatic Service mentioned you. I'm Minos Porter of the Outreach Bureau.
Excuse me, I believe we have mutual friends in the Diplomatic Service. I'm Minos. I represent the Outreach Bureau.
I'm not your friend. What do you want?
Talk, then.
Sir, there may still be a chance.
Well, greetings to all, you came at an opportune time. I'm Minos, from the Outreach Bureau. My strike team is... underperforming.
My lord. I represent the Outreach Bureau. I'm sure you can see that my strike team is having... difficulties.
Excuse me, sir. I represent the Outreach Bureau. I'm sure you can see that my strike team is having... difficulties.
I hope you'll forgive the interruption, but I represent the Outreach Bureau. As you can see, my strike team is having... difficulties.
Speak. But do not test me.
Make your case, Imperial.
I feel loss and fear. They know they have failed.
I sense your troops' pain.
We did all we could, my lord. It wasn't enough.
Blaster burns, carbon-scored armor. It must've been some fight.
Your men don't look good.
Yes, sir. Ugly, sir.
Situation report. Are you in charge?
What's your status?
Yes, sir. This is my operation.
What's the "Outreach Bureau"?
Outreach Bureau?
News, information and psychological warfare. We're very good.
If your strike team can't survive, you planned poorly.
Weaklings shouldn't be here.
Major Shenar thought our forces were enough. It's not Master Porter's fault.
For months, my men have been overriding HoloNet news feeds to broadcast propaganda.
Now we have a new project.
We've seen significant results--enemy morale and recruitment is down. In response, the Dark Council approved Project Eclipse.
If this project is so important, it's time you explain.
Tell me everything.
"Project Eclipse." It's very dramatic.
Impressive-sounding name.
Yes? And?
Eclipse is an inter-ministerial program. Simultaneous military strikes and assassinations galaxy-wide in combination with one key broadcast--a message of intimidation.
Orders were to hijack the Hutt Cartel's central holofeed for the Outreach Bureau.
I have technicians and a speechmaker waiting. But the droid security is too strong, and time is running out. Can you protect my people?
I will carve the path. Your people may follow.
The enemy will face my wrath.
Not many people put their lives in my hands. This should be interesting.
If you trust me, sure.
If the military is counting on us, we don't have a choice.
Project Eclipse can't fail.
You want to tell me why you need the central holofeed?
What are you planning?
We have an important broadcast to make. Beyond that, I'm not at liberty to say.
I'm used to hunting people, not protecting them. But I can do it.
I don't get to bodyguard much.
I'm on it.
Not happening. [Refuse quest.]
All right, everyone. Last wills and testaments to the front. We leave in ten.
Excuse me--I need to prepare my team.
